snippet.title: PS5/Xbox Series X|S/Steam "Ed-0: Zombie Uprising" Launch Trailer (Released on July 13)
snippet.description:
Be ready to sweat your hands and brain, cuz it’s time for O-EDO-ZOMBIE!!

The Japanese-styled and gritty rogue-like action is coming new on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam)!

Commodore Perry, who is extremely frustrated with Japan's refusal to open its borders to the outside world,
explains and complains about the game in the launch trailer of "Ed-0: Zombie Uprising," while also interjecting his own personal feelings.

I don't know if you're "Zom-beings" or what, but you guys are just too stubborn!

▼PlayStation Store
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10006465

▼Microsoft Store
https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/ed-0-zombieuprising/9phfhd4659fl

▼Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1717020/Ed0_Zombie_Uprising
 
■Product Overview
　Title: Ed-0: Zombie Uprising
　Platfors: PlayStation 5、Xbox Series X|S、PC (Steam)
  Release Date： July 13, 2023
　Genre：O-edo Panic Rogue-like
　# of Player: 1
  Developer： LANCARSE
　Publisher： D3PUBLISHER

■Official Website
　https://www.d3p.co.jp/ed-0/

■Official Discord
　https://discord.gg/4dMMPXqKV3

■D3P Official Twitter
　https://twitter.com/D3_PUBLISHER

©2022-2023 LANCARSE　©2022-2023 D3PUBLISHER
